articles.title: Why Trump has invited five African leaders to the White House - BBC
articles.description: The presidents of Gabon, Guinea-Bissau, Liberia, Mauritania and Senegal hope to be offered "incredible" deals.
articles.content:
Abdou Aziz Diédhiou & Ysuf Akínpèlú & Brandon DrenonBBC News, Dakar & Lagos & Washington DC
Donald Trump wants to do business in Africa - and is not interested in aid
